description.message: Finds the next URL and lets you + (increment) numbers in a URL

popup_next_input.description: Title (tool tip) for the increment button image when hovered.

popup_prev_input.description: Title (tool tip) for the decrement button image when hovered.

popup_clear_input.description: Title (tool tip) for the clear button image when hovered.

popup_setup_input.description: Title (tool tip) for the setup button image when hovered.

popup_url_legend.message: Select the part of the URL to modify

popup_interval_label.description: Form label for Increment input number.

popup_selection_blank_error.description: Setup error message if the selection is blank.

popup_selection_notalphanumeric_error.message: Selection can only contain alphanumeric characters
popup_selection_notalphanumeric_error.description: Setup error message if the selection is not alphanumeric.

popup_selection_notinurl_error.message: Selection must be a part of the URL
popup_selection_notinurl_error.description: Setup error message if the selection is not part of the URL.

popup_selectionstart_invalid_error.message: Selection position must be from URL

popup_interval_invalid_error.message: Interval has to be 1 or higher
popup_interval_invalid_error.description: Setup error message if the interval is 0 or negative.

options_shortcut_keys_h3.description: The options page's shortcuts keys heading.

options_default_settings_p.message: You can have URL Next Plus act with these defaults each time you use "Quick" shortcuts or enter Setup.

options_default_mode_use_links_option.message: Use the next (>) and prev (<) links found on the page

options_default_mode_modify_url_option.message: Modify the URL and increment (+) or decrement (-)

options_animations_enable_label.description: Label for CSS3 Animations enable checkbox.
